jobInfo.postDescription:
Job Description 岗位描述
1.	Responsible for environmental testing of products
负责产品的环境类检测
2.	Receive and support internal, external customer test requirement
接收和支持内部、外部客户的测试委托
3.	Prepare test needed tools, accessories, etc. and perform the test
准备测试需要的工具、配件等，完成实验
4.	Arrange test data and write test report
整理测试结果，编写测试报告
5.	Support other colleagues to perform some test assistance task
帮助同事完成一些测试辅助工作
6.	Coordinate external test supplier for outsource test
协调外部测试供应商，完成委外测试
7.	Coordinate supplier for measurement equipment’s repair and maintenance
协调供应商进行测量设备的维修、保养
8.	Internal equipment’s weekly maintenance and daily check and easy repair
内部设备的点检和日常检查和简单维修
9.	Create and manage documentation according to customer & Hella quality requirements
根据客户与海拉内部质量要求，创建和管理相应的文档
10.	Other job assigned by upper leader
部门领导安排的其他工作
Necessary requirements 任职资格
1.	Major in Mechanical or Electronic Engineering
机械或电子专业
2.	Know some environmental tests and experience in handling of test, e.g.: environmental, Waterproof, Salt spray, Mechanical force test, etc.
了解环境测试方法，有相关测试经验，如：环境、防水、盐雾、机械力测试等
3.	Good communication skill, coordination skill and teamwork skill
具有良好的沟通技巧，协调技巧和团队合作技巧
4.	English are read. Able to communicate with foreign colleague directly both via email
英语能读，能够直接用email与国外同事沟通
Additional requirements 附加条件
1.	Familiar with Word，Excel，Outlook office software
熟悉Word, Excel, Outlook等办公室软件
2.	Hard-working and endurance hardships, good interpersonal relationship
吃苦耐劳，良好的人际交流能力
3.	Good working attitude and strong positive Initiative 
工作态度认真，主观能动性强

职位招聘1人
jobInfo.address: 上海浦东新区上海海拉电子有限公司上海市浦东新区建业路411号

brandComInfo.introduce:
HELLA GmbH & Co. KGaA, Lippstadt: HELLA is a global, family-owned company, listed on the stock exchange, with over 125 locations in some 35 countries. With sales of € 7.0 billion in the fiscal year 2018/2019 and 39,000 employees, HELLA is one of the leading automotive suppliers. HELLA specializes in innovative lighting systems and vehicle electronics and has been an important partner to the automotive industry and aftermarket for more than a century. Furthermore, in its Special Applications segment, HELLA develops, manufactures and sells lighting and electronic products for specialist vehicles.  
海拉全球：海拉是一家上市的全球性家族企业，遍布约 35 个国家和地区，拥有超过125 个布点。在 2018/2019 财年的销售额为 70 亿欧元，拥有 39,000 名员工，是全球领先的汽车零部件供应商之一。作为汽车照明和电子产品专家，海拉一百多年来一直是汽车行业和售后市场的重要合作伙伴。此外，海拉在特殊原配套业务领域为特殊车辆开发、制造和销售照明和电子产品。
HELLA in China: In China HELLA has been present for more than 25 years now. With a two-pillar footprint, which consists of own HELLA entities on the one hand and a dedicated joint venture network with local partners on the other, HELLA is serving both international and regional automobile manufacturers. In the fiscal year 2019/2020, HELLA has achieved sales of more than € 900 million in China.
海拉中国：海拉在中国的业务开展已经超过25年。海拉中国布点由两大支柱构成：海拉独资机构，以及与当地合作伙伴建立的合资企业，为国际和本土汽车制造商提供服务。2019/2020财年，海拉在中国的销售额达到9亿欧元。
